title: Champ select!!
body:
Context: has happend 3 times and im losing lp because of it. 
Randomly league will put into champ select but the window is black. I can't select a champ, ban a champ, or type in chat. I dont know what bothers me more, the fact that i have to wait 30mins to queue up again, or that im losing lp. Is there a way i can solve this issue? Its starting to annoy me.

replies.body:
There are some known issues on the Beta Client in champ select that would cause this behavior. Current workarounds include *collapsing* your friends list before queueing for a match or swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if either of those worked for you.
